This photo is a part of the nightscape series commissioned by @sapatrylo for the album‚Äôs release. It is a collaboration in an attempt to visualize the cold and surreal world of Zero Origin.

Combined with the broken rhythm and bowed guitar, this track creates an inexplicable feeling of something futuristic yet primal.

GROUND ZERO
The opening track of Zero Origin lit the path for the rest tone- and timbre-wise. It is built around the recording of the particular effects chain that transformed a simple sine wave into an animated abstract robotic bassline.
